title: FolkArt Dragonfly Glaze Acrylic Paint, 4 Pack
description: The FolkArt 4-piece DragonFly Glaze Acrylic Paint Set will add a touch of show-stopping sheen to your DIY projects. Designed as a topcoat, this 4 piece iridescent acrylic paint has extraordinary light-reflective pigments to create a beautiful iridescent, glossy finish. In light, this shimmering paint allows multiple colors to be viewed from different angles. Layer over dark or light base colors to create an intense, shimmering finish that makes an impact on all your DIY crafts. This glitter acrylic paint has a multi-surface formula that can be used on a variety of surfaces including wood, metal, terra cotta, canvas, paper, and more. Whether you are a novice or expert crafter, you'll love the versatility and shine of this prismatic acrylic paint as part of your arts and crafts supplies. Make the FolkArt 4-piece Dragonfly Glaze Acrylic Paint Set an essential part of your creations for added shimmer and shine to all your projects!
